alert.note: Alert for Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 22 at 3:03AM MDT until April 24 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 12 AM MDT SATURDAY TO 12 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Sierra Madre and Snowy Ranges. * WHEN...From 12 AM MDT Saturday to 12 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Outdoor recreation could become life threatening to those caught unprepared for severe winter conditions. Hikers and snowmobilers may easily become disoriented.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
